channel.title: Projects on Avinash's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Avinash's Portfolio

item.title: Awesomeco
item.description: This project was done for the client Awesome Company, based of Washington, Seattle. It includes many features like ticket creation, ticket management, automated email send to respective authorities. It was planned for 6 months phase, out of which 2 to 3 months were for planning and setting the inital setup for the project. The main acceleration started from the 4th month. And an MVP was being showcased at the end of the project wihtin the prescribed deadline.

item.title: Jabberwocky
item.description: This project was a special project, as this time it was for my favourite dance crew in the world - Jabbawockeez, based of Washington, Seattle. It includes many features like ticket creation, ticket management, automated email send to respective authorities. It was planned for 6 months phase, out of which 2 to 3 months were for planning and setting the inital setup for the project. The main acceleration started from the 4th month.
